role.descr: theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: passive
example.text: Shorn of all their riders, special provisions, and other bells and whistles, insurance policies can still be grouped [*-1] under two broad categories: so-called pure insurance, which amasses no cash value in the policy and pays off only upon death, and permanent insurance, which provides not only a death benefit but also a cash value in the policy that can be used in various ways while the insured is still alive.
